comments.comment: Sri Lanka is full of very intelligent people why can not we find someone new? Do we have to choose from the existing not so good people? It is time we say no to same family politicians unless they prove their worthiness. Last 10 years country has been going down hill only a new leader can bring solutions. So please think and vote not so clinging to known parties. Look what they can do for the country otherwise there wont be a Sri Lanka for us or our children. We have given time for existing politicians to show their true characters, do not vote for fail politicians. Use your intelligence. There are other choices. Look around learn question them then choose.
comments.author: Charmina Navaratnam

comments.comment: Podj deyak kiyannam oyage boruwata mey para sinhala chanda 112 lakshayai, sulujathika chanda laksha 28 pawichi wei. Unpta chanda thiyenne laksha 24,.mey sulujathika chanda laksha 28 kma gathath laksha 52. Janathipathi mathiwaranaya dinanna nam thawa laksha 19 chanda oney. Meka kisi dinaka karanna ba, ehema nam pawena chanda laksha 8 ma 100% ganna obey. JVP chanda ,maithreege chanda 100% ganna oney.meka kisidinaka wenna na.ey hinda ranilta hari sajithta hari daana chanda apathey yana chandayak pamani. Mahindage slfp ekata danatama 61% sinhala chanda thiyanawa.gota 63% sinhala chanda gathath 53% gannawa. Sulu jathika chanda laksha 4 gotata kohomath labenawa. Thonda Douglas  Mahinda haraha. Boru talk nathuwa hitapan mahathayo

replies.replyComment: @naleen j oyagollo kunu harupa kiyagena banagaththama thambinta passa peththenuth henayai.

Sapumali...
Naagaa janapathi karanna kalin aluth wivasthawa kiyawala inna. Janapathi balathala wala thatu kapala thiyenne..
Parliament pakshawala bahuthara balaya anuwa pathwena agamethi thamaa wedda wenne... aneka thamai thani minihekuta wenas karanna puluwan ratak nemei siri lankaea..
Ratata hithathi ayeknam kalauthu wanne javipe pramuka sandaaayak balayata path kireemai..
Naagalata kala heki dheyak nehe. Kata kaiwaaruwa vitharai...
Onanam dinawalaa balanna... 
Wedea gamaralata ehaa vevi....
